attributes.action: No Detention for kids who haven’t done homework!
attributes.additional_details: I say students should not need to worry as they had no power over the situation
attributes.background: Kids have gone through a lot through this pandemic and stressed because of homework I say we shouldn’t let the younger generation be depressed over something they have no control over

rejection.details:
A school's behaviour policy - including deciding on punishments for particular behaviour - is the responsibility of the headteacher. You can find out more about this here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/488034/Behaviour_and_Discipline_in_Schools_-_A_guide_for_headteachers_and_School_Staff.pdf
